After crowd disruptions, the match is finally over and SA register a 6-wicket win to seal the series 2-0, with a game to go. #INDvSA
The fans from the top tiers have been asked to come down. All the top stands are nearly empty now. The match will resume again. #INDvSA
Unfortunately, the players are making their way back to the pavilion due to further crowd trouble. The play has been superseded. #INDvSA
Thankfully, the police have controlled the crowd and the match is about to resume. Raina will start the proceedings after the break. #INDvSA
If the match is called off now, South Africa would be declared winners as they are ahead by 17 runs on the D/L par score. #INDvSA
Players are seated near the pitch, waiting for things to improve. Kohli seems disappointed with the behaviour of the crowd. #INDvSA
Play has been stopped due to crowd trouble again. More bottles being thrown onto the ground, this time from two different stands. #INDvSA
Ravichandran Ashwin, with 29 wickets, is now the leading wicket-taker for India in T20Is. #INDvSA
Ashwin gets de Villiers for the 2nd time in the series and 3rd time overall in T20Is to lift India. SA 49/3, Ashwin ends 4-0-24-3 #INDvSA
Ashwin gives IND a glimmer of hope by snaring two wickets up front. du Plessis is the man dismissed, Mohit takes a fine catch. #INDvSA
Ashwin strikes for India by taking the key scalp of Amla. Rohit at leg-slip takes the catch on the rebound. #INDvSA.
There is a bit of crowd trouble at the stadium. A number of bottles are being thrown onto the field from one of the stands. #INDvSA
IND put on a disappointing show as they are dismissed for a paltry score of 92. This is their second lowest total in T20Is. #INDvSA
What a comeback for Albie. He finishes with figures of 4-0-12-3, castles Bhuvneshwar (0) with the last ball of his spell. 85/9 #INDvSA
Another soft dismissal, Axar Patel hits one straight to Faf du Plessis. India are 85/8. #INDvSA
Imran Tahir is on a hat-trick and he goes berserk with his celebrations. Harbhajan Singh is knocked over by a googly. #INDvSA
"Caaaatch" is the cry from Imran Tahir and Suresh Raina offers a dolly to Hashim Amla. India are 6 down for 69. #INDvSA
Albie Morkel, who bowled a very good first over, comes back and removes MS Dhoni. Good low grab by AB de Villiers. India are 67/5 #INDvSA
Rayudu misses out on a juicy full toss and his leg-stump is pegged back. The hosts now find themselves in a spot of bother. #INDvSA
More brilliance in the field from SA. Miller fires in a direct-hit from point and Rohit Sharma is caught short of the crease. #INDvSA
Disaster for India. Virat Kohli pays the price for taking the first run slowly, Rohit calls for two and Kohli is well short. #INDvSA
Shikhar Dhawan walks right across the stumps and misses the flick, Chris Morris traps him in front. The Cuttack crowd goes quiet. #INDvSA
Slow start for IND. Rohit first hit on the elbow by a throw, then a ball knocks the bat out of his hands. SA have been disciplined #INDvSA
SA opt to bowl, Albie Morkel comes in for Marchant de Lange. For India, Harbhajan Singh replaces Sreenath Aravind. #INDvSA

Rohit Sharma: I put in the same effort for all three formats. The mind-set is always the same. #IndvsSA

Shashank Manohar:  I will assure you all that I would not exercise the chairman's vote until the constitution is amended.

Manohar: Independent auditors to look into BCCI financials.
Manohar: NCA to be revamped.
Manohar: Balance sheets to be put up on the BCCI website at the end of the year.

Zimbabwe beat Pakistan by 5 runs according to D/L method. The series is now square at 1-1 with the final ODI left #ZIMvPAK
That's it! ZIM register just their fourth win over PAK in ODIs. This is also their first win against Pakistan since August, 2013 #ZIMvPAK
Pakistani camp aren't amused, play can be called off at 17:46 local (21:14 IST). If there's no more play, ZIM will be the winners #ZIMvPAK
Shoaib Malik and Aamer Yamin are keeping Pakistan in the hunt. The former brings up yet another ODI fifty, his 34th #ZIMvPAK
Pakistan slump further. Brilliant anticipation from Nyumbu as he moved across to his right at first slip and grabbed a stunner #ZIMvPAK
Sarfraz lobs a dolly to extra cover and Zimbabwe can start to dream now. Five wickets away from a famous win #ZIMvPAK
A brilliant piece of fielding from Mutombodzi at mid-wicket and Zimbabwe get rid of the dangerous Hafeez, RUN OUT for 27. #ZIMvPAK
Asad Shafiq doesn't last long either, goes chasing after a wide ball and gets a healthy edge to the keeper. OUT for 1 #ZIMvPAK
Panyangara has two and Pakistan have lost both openers now. Can Zimbabwe pull off an upset win? #ZIMvPAK
A duck for debutant Bilal Asif, mistimes the heave and finds mid-off. Earlier, he finished with 0/39 (8) with the ball #ZIMvPAK
86 runs in the last 8 overs gives Zimbabwe a very good score on the board. #ZIMvPAK
Freak dismissal for Elton Chigumbura. He smashes the stumps with his bat even before the ball arrives and is out hit wicket. #ZIMvPAK
Elton Chigumbura records his 19th ODI fifty off 46 balls. He's providing the aggression Zimbabwe needed towards the end. #ZIMvPAK
Chamu Chibhabha's wait for a maiden ODI hundred continues. Sarfraz takes a good catch to send back the opener for a well-made 90 #ZIMvPAK
One brings two for Pakistan. Sean Williams edges Riaz to slip and is OUT for 10. Onus now firmly on Chibhabha #ZIMvPAK
Chari's vigil ends at 39, the second wicket stand with Chibhabha was worth 91 runs. Much needed wicket for Pakistan #ZIMvPAK
Zimbabwe have fared a lot better against spin today. Chibhabha brings up his 14th ODI fifty. #ZIMvPAK
From Rohit's scoop to Duminy's steel - Best moments from Dharamsala, by @vishaal_CB #INDvSA
The ploy of promoting Hamilton Masakadza to open the innings hasn't worked for Zimbabwe. He's the first wkt to fall, OUT for 7 #ZIMvPAK

4 6 1 1LB 1 1 - 14 runs from the 19th over bowled by Bhuvneswar. Debutant Aravind needs to defend 9 runs from the final over #INDvSA
Rare angry gesture from Bhuvneshwar after a plumb LBW call goes against him. Can Duminy make most of the life and take SA home? #INDvSA

AB de Villiers so far 27(13): 1 6 . 4  . . 4 1 2 . 4 4 1 #INDvSA

The 100 is up for India after just 11.1 overs. Can Rohit, Kohli & Co. take them beyond 200? #INDvSA
Morris, who has played for CSK and RR in the IPL, is having a tough time today: wd, 1, 0, 4, 1, 1, 6, 6, 4, 1, 1, 1, 1. (2-0-28-0) #INDvSA

Rohit nearly ran himself out earlier and now he runs out his partner. Dhawan falls for 3 and India lose their first wicket. #INDvSA

Australia include Bancroft, Fekete in squad for Bangladesh Tests:
John Hastings' opening spell and M. Marsh's 4-fer feature in our winning moments of the day:
Australia stay at number one in the ICC ODI rankings with 127 points, 12 ahead of 2nd placed India. England stay 6th with 100. #ENGvAUS
ENG's summer:Drew with NZ 1-1 in Tests, won ODIs 3-2, won the lone T20IBeat AUS 3-2 in Tests, won the lone T20I, lost ODIs 2-3.#ENGvAUS
Australia's tour of EnglandLost the 5-match Ashes Test series 2-3Lost the one off T20IWon the 5-match ODI series 3-2#ENGvAUS
Smith begins his Australian ODI captaincy with a 3-2 series win over England. His captaincy debut came in the win against Ireland #ENGvAUS
Finch loves batting at Old Trafford. He made 53 in the third ODI, he's now batting on 52 today, his 9th ODI fifty #ENGvAUS
At lunch, England were in with a chance but it's all Australia since then. Cruising towards a series victory #ENGvAUS
Australia go to the lunch break at 36/2. They need 103 more to win the game and the series. #ENGvAUS
Mark Wood gets the big wicket of Steven Smith just before the break. Australia are 31/2. #ENGvAUS
Aaron Finch cracks three fours off Reece Topley's third over to get Australia going. #ENGvAUS
England get the early wicket that they badly needed. David Willey does it again, Joe Burns is out for a 10-ball duck. #ENGvAUS
England all-out for 138, their lowest ODI total against Australia since 2007. #ENGvAUS
It has been confirmed that Eoin Morgan will play no further part in the game. #ENGvAUS
Hastings comes back and gets a wicket first ball, his third wicket of the game. Mark Wood is the latest to go. 107/8. #ENGvAUS
A loud cheer from the crowd as Mark Wood hits a boundary and brings up England's hundred. #ENGvAUS
Mitchell Marsh is on a roll, he has four now. A well set Ben Stokes is dismissed, England 7 down under 100. #ENGvAUS
JUST IN: Ravi Shastri to be Indian Team Director till the World T20 in 2016.
Mitch Marsh does it once again. Moeen Ali edges one to Wade. England have lost half their side for just 72 on the board. #ENGvAUS
England lose their fourth, Mitch Marsh traps Jonny Bairstow in front. Good review from Australia to get the on-field call changed. #ENGvAUS
Even Darren Lehmann comes down and talks to Mitchell Starc near the boundary. #ENGvAUS
Mitchell Starc looks really disturbed at the start of his run-up. Steve Smith runs from slip and has a chat to calm him down #ENGvAUS
Eoin Morgan is walking off - retired hurt. Jonny Bairstow walks out. #ENGvAUS
Starc wears a really worried look on his face as the physio talks to Morgan. He also checks Morgan's health. #ENGvAUS
Oh dear! Eoin Morgan is hit flush on the helmet by a Mitchell Starc bouncer and he is not moving freely. Physio attends to him. #ENGvAUS
Massive blow for England! John Hastings forces the in-form James Taylor to edge one to the keeper. It's 22/3 inside 6 overs. #ENGvAUS
Alex Hales' horror series ends. His scores: 22, 18, 9, 0 & 4 today. Maxwell almost drops the sitter but manages to grab the rebound #ENGvAUS
Dramatic start!0.2 Roy given out LBW, he reviews successfully0.4 Roy given out LBW, review not taken - could've saved him again #ENGvAUS
Team changes:England: Plunkett out, Reece Topley to make his ODI debut.Australia: Marcus Stoinis, Pattinson out; Agar, Starc in #ENGvAUS
"We are going to bat first. Conditions look similar to the third ODI," says Eoin Morgan at the toss. #ENGvAUS
England level the series 2-2. First time in the series, a team has won chasing. A calm Moeen Ali sees the home team through #ENGvAUS
Maxwell single-handedly keeping AUS in the game. Takes another screamer to get rid of Plunkett. 18 required with 3 wickets in hands #ENGvAUS
Maxwell once again in the thick of things, removes the dangerous looking Bairstow (27-ball 31). ENG need 39 and AUS require 4 wkts #ENGvAUS
Jason Roy and James Taylor register their fifty partnership in quick-time. England have recovered well despite losing Hales early. #ENGvAUS
James Taylor is counter-attacking the Aussie bowlers. 24 out of his 25 runs have come in boundaries. #ENGvAUS
Alex Hales' poor run continues. His scores in the last 5 ODIs: 1, 22, 18, 9 & 0 now. 3rd time in 5 games that Cummins has got Hales #ENGvAUS
An unbeaten 84-run stand between Wade (50 off 26) and Hastings (34 from 26) lifts Australia to 299/7 from a precarious 215/7. #ENGvAUS
A reverse sweep brings about another Australian batter's downfall. The debutant, Marcus Stoinis, falls to Moeen Ali for just 4. #ENGvAUS
2 wickets in 3 balls for Plunkett. Sends back Marsh (17) and a well-set Bailey (75). Australia in trouble at 211/6 #ENGvAUS
Bowled him! Glenn Maxwell misses the reverse sweep and Moeen Ali knocks out the leg pole. Misses out on a hundred by 15 runs. #ENGvAUS
George Bailey records his 17th ODI fifty. Also his second of the series and third in his last six innings. #ENGvAUS
Splendid recovery from Australia after being reduced to 30/3. Maxwell and Bailey record their second 100-plus partnership in ODIs. #ENGvAUS
Glenn Maxwell muscles one all the way and gets to his 12th ODI fifty in style. #ENGvAUS
Australia reach 100 in the 20th over, thanks to a brisk partnership between Maxwell and Bailey. #ENGvAUS
Would you believe it? Glenn Maxwell has been dropped for the second time, Adil Rashid the culprit now. #ENGvAUS
Jason Roy drops Glenn Maxwell at second slip. It could have been number four for England. How costly is it going to be? #ENGvAUS
First 3 ODIs: No opening bowler (from both sides) could take an early wicket.David Willey: Takes 3 in his 1st spell of the series #ENGvAUS
David Willey is on fire. Aaron Finch pokes away from the body and edges it to the keeper. Australia three down inside 9 overs. #ENGvAUS
Massive blow! David Willey traps Steven Smith right in front to reduce AUS to 25/2. Great start for ENG despite losing the toss #ENGvAUS
David Willey strikes early for ENG. Burns hangs his bat out and ends up dragging it back onto the stumps. #ENGvAUS
Australia opt to bat, Marcus Stoinis to make his debut. Hastings replaces No. 1 ODI bowler, Starc. England bring in Wood and Willey #ENGvAUS

Suresh Raina, Pragyan Ojha, Harbhajan Singh, Mohd Shami included in 30-man list for preparatory camp ahead of RSA series. #IndiavSouthAfrica

Ali & Rashid spin Australia OUT. Comprehensive win for England as they register their 1st win of the series #ENGvAUS
Ashton Agar and Mitchell Starc depart in a space of 5 balls. Moeen Ali and Adil Rashid together: 20-2-73-5. England need 2 more #ENGvAUS
Australia's wheels are coming apart in the chase. Marsh the latest to bite the dust, OUT for 13. England need 4 wickets to win #ENGvAUS
Spinners are doing it for ENG. Now Bailey follows Maxwell back to the hut. Pressure on AUS as they need 160 with 5 wickets in hand. #ENGvAUS
Maxwell gone too! After 2 successive reverse sweeps that fetched him 8 runs, Maxi repeats the same shot and perishes. AUS 137/4 #ENGvAUS
Rashid removes the dangerous-looking Finch, who miscues the loft and offers a dolly to Woakes at long-on. OUT for 53, AUS 110/3  #ENGvAUS
What a return to international cricket. Aaron Finch scores a fifty in his comeback game - his 8th in ODIs. AUS 100/2 in 20 overs #ENGvAUS
Australia's run-machine, Steven Smith has been sent back by a Finn stunner. The tall fast bowler, dives and plucks a one-hander #ENGvAUS
Australia start the same way as ENG. Finch looking good as Roy. Burns was scratchy like Hales, he departs for 9 as well. AUS: 33/1 #ENGvAUS
ENG finish on 300. They scored only 64/4 in the last 10 overs. Starc (10-0-79-1), his worst ODI figures when he has bowled 10 overs #ENGvAUS
Taylor likes to bat against AUS. His scores against them - 0,5,4,98*, 49, 43, 101*. Follow the action here: #ENGvAUS
He was stranded on 98 during the World Cup game against Australia. No stopping James Taylor this time, registers his maiden ODI ton #ENGvAUS
Bairstow and Moeen fall in quick succession. The former caught short by a direct-hit from Smith, the latter mistimes one to long-on #ENGvAUS
Stokes' scratchy stay at the crease comes to an end, OUT for 14. Maxwell gets his second. AUS pulling it back, ENG 236/4 (40 ov) #ENGvAUS
Maxi has broken the 119-run stand. Morgan miscues a loft and holes out to long-off, GONE for 62. A timely wicket for Australia #ENGvAUS
Fifty for Eoin Morgan. Fifty for James Taylor. 100-run partnership for the 3rd wicket. England all set for a big score. 188/2 #ENGvAUS
Eoin Morgan is having a tough time. First was peppered with short balls from Cummins, then survives a stumping chance off Agar #ENGvAUS
First ODI wicket for Agar. Jason Roy once again falls in the 60s, he was out for 67 in the first ODI and now 63. ENG: 86/2 in 15 ov #ENGvAUS
Jason Roy completes his 2nd ODI fifty and both have come in this series. His scores: 67, 31 and today 52*. ENG: 69/1 after 12 ov #ENGvAUS
Hales throws it away. An action-replay of his 1st ODI dismissal, 3rd time in the series he's been caught inside the 30-yard circle  #ENGvAUS
Jason Roy's golden run in the series continues, smacks 4 fours off Starc's 4th over. ENG off to a good start #ENGvAUS
Morgan decides to bat first. Buttler rested, Bairstow comes in. For AUS, Agar debuts, Finch and Pattinson also get a game. #EngvsAus

Lots of cheers for Morgan and lots of boos for Smith. The former looks angry while the latter just smiles and accepts the boos. #EngvAus
Morgan: 'I would've withdrawn the appeal'. Smith: 'That is disappointing, the umpires saw what I did and he gave it out'. #EngvAus
Australia win by 64 runs, lead the series 2-0. Morgan's brave knock goes in vain. Lot of controversy & drama in the last 20 overs #ENGvAUS
Morgan's response post that brutal delivery: 1,0,1,6,4,6,6,1. ENG need 97 from 60. Catch the action here: #ENGvAUS
Plenty happening at Lord's. Woakes gone for 6, Morgan struck by a ferocious bouncer from Cummins. ENG 186/7 (37 ov.) #ENGvAUS
Stokes becomes the 5th batsman to be given out for obstructing the field. Find out what the law says here: #ENGvAUS
Buttler gone too! the hosts in deep trouble now. ENG - 144/5 (27 ov). Lot of jeers from the crowd following the Stokes incident #ENGvAUS
Drama at Lord's. Stokes given out for obstructing the field. Morgan and Smith indulge in a heated chat. #ENGvAUS
Mitch Marsh is having a dream day. Notched up quick-fire 64 with the bat and now removes James Taylor to break a 51-run stand. #ENGvAUS
Despite two catches being dropped off his bowling, Cummins comes back with a bang. Picks up the scalp of Jason Roy. #ENGvAUS
Taylor is living a charmed life as he gets his second reprieve. Stoinis, the substitute fielder, is the culprit this time around. #ENGvAUS
Smith had taken a similar catch at short cover to send Jos Buttler back to the pavilion in the 2015 World Cup game against ENG. #ENGvAUS
Steven Smith flies full length and takes a spellbinding catch to dismiss Alex Hales. Timely breakthrough for the tourists. #ENGvAUS
AUS post 300 plus again. Mitch Marsh who was scratchy in Southampton, smashed ENG all over the park. Hosts need 310 in 49 overs #ENGvAUS
Mitchell Marsh played power-packed shots to up the ante and smash his 5th ODI fifty. AUS within touching distance of crossing 300. #ENGvAUS
The Aussie BOOM BOOM Maxi is gone, out for an entertaining 38-ball 49. Also surpassed 50 sixes in ODIs during this knock. #ENGvAUS
Adil Rashid gets the prized scalp, Steven Smith is the man dismissed for a well-measured knock of 70. AUS are 173/3 in 34 overs. #ENGvAUS
Bailey departs after a fluent fifty. Meanwhile, Warner is declared fit to bat, he won't field though. AUS 148/2 (30 ov). #ENGvAUS
Bailey and Smith crack fifties. The duo have set the platform for Australia to get a big score. #ENGvAUS
Australia lose their first wicket. Burns, after a promising knock, gets knocked over by a nip-backer from Finn.  AUS - 42/1 (9 ov) #ENGvAUS
David Warner had to retire hurt after being pinged on his left thumb by a vicious short delivery from Steven Finn. #ENGvAUS
England win toss and opt to bowl, Mark Wood rested with Liam Plunkett taking his place. Australia are unchanged. #ENGvAUS
Rain has stopped and the covers have come off. Toss at 11:00, play will begin at 11:30. It will be a 49-over-per-side game. #ENGvAUS
Good news folks! Rain has eased off and it is getting brighter. However, the toss has been delayed #ENGvAUS
It is drizzling at the moment at Lord's and the covers are on. Hopefully, the 2nd ODI between ENG and AUS will start on time. #ENGvAUS
The Moin-ud-Dowla Gold Cup is, in many ways, a precursor to the IPL, writes @G_Rajaraman:
The Wade-Marsh stand and Watson's crucial strikes feature in our winning moments: #ENGvAUS
From 194/4 to 246 all-out. England certainly lost the plot after a 70-run opening stand. AUS win by 59 runs & lead the series 1-0. #ENGvsAUS
It's all going Australia's way at the moment. ENG lose 3 wickets in 4 balls. Coulter-Nile gets two in two. ENG 199/7 (37 ov). #ENGvsAUS
Stokes loses his patience and chips Starc to the fielder at short mid-wicket. ENG are in a bit of trouble at 176/4 in 33 overs. #ENGvAUS
Wade composes his 6th ODI fifty as the tourists look set to reach a sizeable total on the board. AUS are 274/6 in 47 overs. #ENGvsAUS
Watson is sold down the river by Wade and is run-out. Australia slip further and now are in a spot of bother at 195/6 in 38 overs. #ENGvsAUS
The BOOM BOOM Maxi is OUT, strangled down the leg-side. Australia lose their last 4 wickets for 59 runs. 192/5 in 36 overs. #ENGvsAUS
Adil Rashid is on fire. His previous 19 deliveries - W,0,0,0,2,0,1,1,1,0,6,2,0,1,0,6,W,1,W. Bailey, the latest to depart. #ENGvsAUS
Rashid gets two, dismisses both the openers. Warner added another 41 runs after his reprieve. AUS 133/2. #ENGvsAUS
Warner hits a fifty on his vice-captaincy debut. Smith and Warner are going along nicely. AUS 113/1 (23 overs) #ENGvsAUS
Joe Burns throws his wicket away by driving a full toss straight back at Adil Rashid, who takes a fine return catch. #ENGvsAUS
David Warner gets a reprieve on 18, Woakes spills a tough return catch. How costly is this going to prove? #ENGvsAUS
David Warner and Joe Burns give Australia a solid start, they are 51/0 after 9 overs. #ENGvsAUS
JUST IN: Marvan Atapattu resigns as Sri Lanka's head coach after Test series defeat against India.
AUS opt to bat, same side from the Ireland game. James Taylor comes in for Joe Root, who has been rested. #ENGvsAUS

Top performer, Ashwin, took his series wickets tally to 21 in India's 117-run win at the SSC:

Ishant will miss the first Test against @OfficialCSA in Mohali. Lahiru Thirimanne and Dhammika Prasad fined 50% of their match fee. #INDvsSL
BREAKING: Ishant Sharma, Dinesh Chandimal handed one-match bans for their breach of ICC's Code of Conduct.
Thank you, all. We thoroughly enjoyed being the title sponsors of the #SLvIND Test series. #CricbuzzCup #Proud
Ashwin: Thankfully in the last two games Sri Lanka bowled first so I was watching closely what Herath did.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Ashwin: I've realised that Tests are not a child's game.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Kohli: This series belongs to the bowlers apart from Pujara, who played one of the best innings that I've seen.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Kohli: I don't want to say I've grown as a captain. If I lose then I'll be made a child again.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Kohli: An angry fast bowler is a captain's delight. I'm very happy with the things that happened yesterday.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Kohli: It's really important to back guys like Stuart and Rohit. They can actually turn the game around.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Kohli: I don't think at any stage we thought we would lose.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Mathews: The wicket was demanding. Pujara batted brilliantly and he was the one who held the innings together.#CricbuzzCup #INDvsSL
Mathews: Kusal batted really well in both innings. He looks a tremendous player. He grabbed his opportunity.#INDvsSL #CricbuzzCup
Mathews: We picked a team which we thought was good enough to win on this wicket. We could have chased this down if we had a good start.
Mathews: We try not to ask for wickets. We let the curator do what he wants. SSC has usually been super flat.#CricbuzzCup
Mathews: We wanted someone who can bat quickly in the middle order. We felt Tharanga opening was better.#CricbuzzCup
Ashwin: 'I wasn't concerned with the demotion (batting order in the 2nd inns). I had concerns with my tennis elbow' #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Ravichandran Ashwin: 'The catching has been brilliant and that's why I find myself with 21 wickets' #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Cricbuzz Man of the Match: Cheteshwar Pujara.Man of the Series: Ravichandran Ashwin. #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Kohli: 'Feels special to create a bit of history. This is a young team, amazing to win the series after being 0-1 down' #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Mathews: 'I thought giving away 300+ in their first innings, under challenging conditions, was a bit too much'- #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Mohammad Azharuddin and Virat Kohli are the only two Indian captains to have won a Test series in Sri Lanka #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Ashwin finished the series with 21 wkts, his 3rd best wicket tally in a Test series, his best ever performance overseas #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
First away series wins for 8 of the current Indian playing XI. Ishant, Kohli and  Mishra played in the 2011 series win #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Since the win against WI in 2011, IND lost to ENG 0-4, to AUS 0-4, to RSA 0-1, to NZ 0-1, to ENG 1-3, to AUS 0-2 #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
This is India's first overseas series win against a top-8 Test playing nation since beating West Indies in 2011 #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
India beat Sri Lanka by 117 runs and clinch the 3-Test series by a 2-1 margin. Series win in Sri Lanka after 22 years #CricbuzzCUp #SLvIND
Dhammika Prasad tries to attack and gifts his wicket. India are just one wicket away from bagging a historic series win #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Ravichandran Ashwin strikes first ball in his new spell. Rangana Herath is out LBW, Sri Lanka are 8 down. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
200th Test wicket for Ishant Sharma. He traps Angelo Mathews plumb in front straightaway after tea. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
We are in for an exciting finish. Mathews fighting hard. IND need 4 wickets, SL need 137 runs. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Kusal turns back to have a heated chat after something was said as he was walking off. Ashwin intervenes & calms things #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Heartbreak for Kusal Perera. Just like Gatting (1987 WC final), tries the reverse sweep and gets out at a crucial time #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
7th Test hundred for Angelo Mathews, four have come in the second innings. This is his second hundred of the #CricbuzzCup. #SLvIND
Loud shout from Mishra, Mathews escapes a close LBW call. Ump Llong suggests there was an edge, but replays show no bat #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Kusal Perera earns the distinction of registering fifties in both innings of his debut Test. Sri Lanka cross 200. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Positive start from Sri Lanka after lunch. They have added 21 runs in three overs. Going for the win? #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Mathews continues to wage a lone battle for his team. The skipper reaches his 23rd Test fifty, long way to go though #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Thirimanne's resistance is over. Excellent reflex catch from Rahul at silly point. Ashwin has his first wicket #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Ishant, Umesh and Binny have been very consistent this morning. Unlucky not to have taken more than one wicket #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Just in: Chandimal, Ishant, Dhammika and Thirimanne charged for breaching ICC code of conduct. Details after #SLvIND third Test.
2nd slice of luck for Mathews. Sets off for a suicidal single, would have been well short had Ashwin made a direct hit #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
The pull shot consumes Silva. He goes after Umesh and badly mistimes it to mid-wicket. The 53-run stand has been broken #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Ishant finds Mathews' edge but he has overstepped. That could have been the perfect start for India on Day 5 #CricbuzzCup #SLvIND
Big batting day for Sri Lanka. Thirimanne was practising some drives early in the morning. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Rained earlier, pitch uncovered, but things look much brighter now. Plenty of blue skies around. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Australia lost their last 5 wickets for just 14 runs. #ENGvAUS
England beat Australia by 5 runs in the one-off T20I, an excellent come-from-behind win. #ENGvAUS
Is there a twist in the tale? David Willey gets the big wicket of Steve Smith - 90(53). Australia need 18 off 9, 5 wickets in hand. #ENGvAUS
Australia are doing this nicely. They need 41 runs from 24 balls with seven wickets in hand. #ENGvAUS
Needed some brilliance to end this ominous looking 112-run stand and Ben Stokes take a stunner to remove Glenn Maxwell. #ENGvAUS
Steve Smith records his maiden T20I fifty. The Australian stand-in captain leading from the front. #ENGvAUS
After a couple of early wickets, Maxwell and Smith have steadied the innings. The 50 partnership comes up, Australia 64/2 in 8 ov #ENGvAUS
Watson's poor English summer continues. Tries to kick the ball away from the stumps, misses and is bowled, OUT for 8 #ENGvAUS
Willey strikes early for England. Warner gets into a tangle while playing the flick, Finn pouches it at third man, OUT for 4 #ENGvAUS
England first 6 overs - 27/2. Next 10 overs - 125/0. Last 4 overs - 30/3. Moeen remains unbeaten on 72. Target for Australia - 183 #ENGvAUS
Rohit's fluency and three repeated errors feature in our Winning Moments of the day. #SLvIND #CricbuzzCup
Jos Buttler perishes in pursuit of quick runs. Hits a four and a six, OUT the very next ball. Starc has the final laugh #ENGvAUS
Skipper Eoin Morgan departs after a breezy innings. OUT for 74 off 39 balls, Coulter-Nile breaks the dangerous 135-run partnership #ENGvAUS
Watson in his 2nd over: 6 2 0 6 6 WD 1 - 22 runs. Morgan reaches his 7th T20I 50. England are accelerating as we approach the end #ENGvAUS
Moeen Ali registers his maiden T20I fifty. The 100 also has come up for the hosts. Boyce goes for 19 runs in his first over #ENGvAUS
Morgan is now England's highest run-getter in T20Is. He goes past Kevin Pietersen, who has scored 1176 runs #ENGvAUS
Morgan hits one out of the park, a passer-by picks it up and throws it back into the ground. #ENGvAUS
